description: Romee backed by over 40 years of experience, created a niche of its own, as manufacturers of an exquisite and stunning range of home furnishings solutions, accessories. Our penchant for constant innovation in the mix of varied product constructions with the fusion of design and eye-catching colours has rewarded us in achieving great aesthetics in all our products. Romee, over the years, has developed the art and expertise to cater 360-degree audience be it the elite or the masses.
